addon.dependency_missmatch.max:
Addon "%1$s" depends on an older version of "%2$s"!
Replace "%2$s" with versions that are within pack formats %3$s.
addon.dependency_missmatch.min:
Addon "%1$s" depends on a newer version of "%2$s"!
Replace "%2$s" with versions that are within pack formats %3$s.
advancements.aspects.aspect.become_any.l: You've lost something you will never get back...
advancements.aspects.aspect.elytrian.fly: Fly a total of 7km without the help of Firework Rockets, Riptide Tridents, Damage Boosting or Elytrian's Focus while confined to the world's build height
You want a medal with that?
advancements.aspects.aspect.elytrian.rec: Use a dye to change the pattern of your wings
advancements.aspects.aspect.elytrian.roo: Winged and ready to soar the skies
advancements.aspects.aspect.enderian.roo: Tall, bulky and difficult to outmaneuver
advancements.aspects.aspect.feline.fell_: Attempt to land on a Stalagmite safely
Lands on all fours? Well better not in this case
Cute, agile and deadly on a hunt
advancements.aspects.aspect.honey_bee.bu: Create enough Suspicious Honey to fill a Chest
advancements.aspects.aspect.honey_bee.co: Have someone pick up your Suspicious Honey that is spiked
advancements.aspects.aspect.honey_bee.ho: Produce every type of Suspicious Honey
advancements.aspects.aspect.honey_bee.ro: Gently fly through the flower fields
advancements.aspects.aspect.human.root.l: Please tell me you didn't become corrupted just to end up this
advancements.aspects.aspect.infernal.fir: Kill an On Fire mob while you are On Fire
advancements.aspects.aspect.infernal.roo: A fierce bright red flame burns within, use fire to melt the opposition away
advancements.aspects.aspect.merling.boil: Abuse a Water Cauldron to become wet in The Nether
advancements.aspects.aspect.merling.dead: Only one of us gets to leave this alive
advancements.aspects.aspect.merling.root: Top of the food chain in the seas, not much so outside however
advancements.aspects.aspect.obtain_relic: Obtain a Faded Relic of an Aspect
advancements.aspects.aspect.shulk.root.l: Small, cunning and can easily piss you off
advancements.aspects.get_aspect_encyclop: Obtain any entry of The Aspect Encyclopedia
Better to make a Poor Informed Choice than just a Poor Choice
aspect.aspects.elytrian.brittle_bones.de:
They are usually not exposed to fall damage due to them being skilled flyers, but if it happens, it will hurt, A LOT.
They also damage their wings when using Firework Rockets!
aspect.aspects.elytrian.description: Soar the skies, explore the vast world! Oh, how incredible is that! Just be careful not to get dived by them.
aspect.aspects.elytrian.elytra_natural.d: Unlike a normal Elytra, they get more attack damage mid-flight and can hold Sneak to descend faster.
aspect.aspects.elytrian.winged_body.desc:
They carry a unique set of wings!
Due to the unique design of their wings, armor cannot be worn, as the wings require ample space to function properly.
The Elytra can be damaged and will need repairing via Experience.
aspect.aspects.enderian.description: While water is not their strength, the Enderian excel at nearly everything else, provided they can fit there that is.
aspect.aspects.enderian.end_attuned.desc: Distortions of space is natural to them, the likes of Ender Pearls do no harm.
aspect.aspects.enderian.slender_body.des: Elongated body and limbs makes them much larger, but allow for reach and general health increases.
aspect.aspects.feline.cat_eyes.descripti: Nightlight is natural to them and can see clearly in the dark.
aspect.aspects.feline.description: Cute, agile and deadly once hunting. What's not to love?
aspect.aspects.feline.nine_lives.descrip: Being part cat, they are slightly smaller in size and have a bit less health while not taking damage when landing from high places, except if the surface is very pointy...
aspect.aspects.feline.predator.descripti: Attacking an entity, they become even faster, but if not attacking for an extended period will become slowed instead.
aspect.aspects.feline.quickness.descript:
They are naturals at speed, being much faster when sprinting then others.
However while fast on foot, mining is very boring to them and break blocks slower.
aspect.aspects.feline.water.description:
Being wet is the end of the world for them! Well, not literally.
While wet they are drastically slowed down, and even worse in actual water.
aspect.aspects.generic.aquatic.descripti:
They do not require oxygen to survive, instead needing to maintain moisture by exposing themselves to water to prevent drying out.
The Impaling enchantment deals additional damage to them.
aspect.aspects.generic.hydrophobic.descr:
Water is very deadly to them, damaging overtime if exposed to any kind of source of water.
Can be temporarily suppressed with Water Ward enchantment.
aspect.aspects.honey_bee.bee_sized.descr: Being bug-like, they are vulnerable to Bane of Arthropods enchantment, and their smaller size comes with reduced health.
aspect.aspects.honey_bee.cautious_flying: Though they possess a durable elytra, they rely on it constantly for jumping, gliding, and moving. To avoid wearing it out, they fly and glide slower than most, but don't worry about fall damage as a consequence.
aspect.aspects.honey_bee.description: Master of Nature, Flowers and Honey. Can be very friendly, but if forced into something, good results aren't guaranteed.
aspect.aspects.honey_bee.exoskeletal_ely: They possess a natural elytra, deeply integrated with their body, making it unbreakable and providing additional armor.
aspect.aspects.human.description: Well-documented throughout history, they are as close a match to a normal person as possible
aspect.aspects.infernal.burning_blood.de: Attempting to Poison, Infest or give Weakness to them while they are On Fire will not work, they will just shrug it off.
aspect.aspects.infernal.description: Burning bright, strong as fire itself, yet defeated by water. Almost feels like a cruel act of... wait, did someone design it this way?
While On Fire they generate extreme heat to the point where Raw Food held by them will be cooked to perfection!
Guess they're useful for SOMETHING at least...
aspect.aspects.infernal.might_of_the_fir: Fire seems to be completely harmless to them, in fact, it actually empowers their damage further! However not being On Fire slows their attacks down.
aspect.aspects.infernal.too_hot.descript:
They become super heated while On Fire, attacking them will set their attackers On Fire too!
They can abuse this to set themselves On Fire too if they attack On Fire creatures as well.
aspect.aspects.merling.aqua_affinity.des: They naturally ignore mining penalties while underwater, but struggle to mine effectively without water unless they have an Aqua Affinity enchantment.
aspect.aspects.merling.description: Water attuned and ready to explore the deep unknowns. Known to be territorial and very persistent.
aspect.aspects.merling.finned_legs.descr: Their legs are adapted for swift movement in water, drastically increasing swim speed at the cost of reduced movement and attack speed on land, unless it's raining.
aspect.aspects.merling.fish_eyes.descrip: Their eyes are extremely good at seeing things in the dark or water, but require to be submerged in water on a regular basis.
aspect.aspects.merling.trident_mastery.d:
Tridents are their weapon of choice.
The Impaling enchantment provides additional damage to all targets, functioning similarly to the Sharpness enchantment along with Impaling's base effect.
aspect.aspects.rascal.cave_attuned.descr: They are smaller in size, allowing them to squeeze into tight spaces, but this comes at the cost of reduced health and a shorter effective attack range. However, they are exceptionally good at mining blocks from a distance.
aspect.aspects.rascal.description: Spawn of The Underground, perfected to be one with darkness, but not as much with the light...
aspect.aspects.rascal.photosensitive.des: When exposed to sunlight, they move noticeably slower, deal significantly less damage, mine more slowly, and attack less quickly.
Within the darkness, they can reach their fullest potential, with night vision.
While in dark spaces, they move much faster, deal slightly more damage, mine somewhat faster, and attack a bit quicker.
aspect.aspects.shulk.description: Often regarded as annoying little pests by the masses, they're capable of hiding an entire chest's worth of items, and themselves...
aspect.aspects.shulk.febile_limbs.descri:
Small limbs can only do so much.
They do less damage, knockback and have reduced reach, but their fast attacks can deter would-be attackers.
aspect.aspects.shulk.shell.description:
They still have their shell, somewhat.
Gains absorption hearts after not taking damage for a while.
aspect.aspects.shulk.small_footprint.des: They are tiny in size and easy to kill due to their low health.
badge_details.aspects.effect.restrict_sl: Cannot equip items in %1$s slot, except %2$s

death.attack.hydrophobia.item: %1$s tried to swim in water to escape %2$s using %3$s
death.attack.hydrophobia.player: %1$s tried to swim in water to escape %2$s
This Aspect does not have any Aspect Effects
dialog.aspects.aspect_info.focus.hover:
Picking this Aspect will NOT start you with a focus, you will need to craft it.
You can find the recipe of this focus in your Recipe Book when in a Crafting Table.
dialog.aspects.aspect_info.focus.none.de: This Aspect does not have any Focus Powers
dialog.aspects.aspect_info.hover_tutoria: Hover over entries inside square brackets to learn more about it!
dialog.aspects.choose_aspect.lore:
A deal was made, though you have no memory of it.
Now, claim your reward.
dialog.aspects.chosen_aspect.confirmatio: Are you sure you want to choose â%sâ as your Aspect?
dialog.aspects.chosen_aspect.effects.non: This Aspect does not have any Aspect Effects
dialog.aspects.chosen_aspect.focus.hover:
Picking this Aspect will NOT start you with a focus, you will need to craft it.
You can find the recipe of this focus in your Recipe Book when in a Crafting Table.
This Aspect does not have any Focus Powers
dialog.aspects.chosen_aspect.hover_tutor: Hover over entries inside square brackets to learn more about it!
dialog.aspects.custom_items: List of Custom Items related to Aspects
dialog.aspects.custom_items.aspect_focus:
Aspect Focuses have many different versions per each Aspect (minus %s) thus have many different uses based on what aspect version it is

The recipe is also version dependent so please check out the Recipe Book when crafting at a Crafting Table!
dialog.aspects.custom_items.awakened_ess: Check out %s on how to create this item
Awakened Essence Cage stores an Aspect which when consumed makes you that Aspect
dialog.aspects.custom_items.essence_cage: Check out %s on how to use Essences for this purpose
Essence Cage is used to store Essences which can be used to create an Awakened Essence Cage that stores an Aspect
dialog.aspects.custom_items.essence_clea: Essence Cleaner is used to remove Essences and Aspects from items like the Essence Cage or Awakened Essence Cage
dialog.aspects.custom_items.essence_extr:
Essence Extractor is used to extract Essences from passive mobs without killing them
This kind of extraction can only be done once per mob
dialog.aspects.enchantments: List of Custom Enchantments related to Aspects
dialog.aspects.enchantments.water_ward.a:
Increases the delay water damage is delayed by %1$s seconds (max of %2$s)
Provides a %3$s%% (max of %4$s%%) chance to ignore item damage when delaying water damage
dialog.aspects.enchantments.water_ward.d:
When exposed to water this Enchantment delays damage from water for %s seconds
While it is delaying water damage it will damage the enchanted item instead
Has no effect on consumed water items
dialog.aspects.essences.explanation.awak: If the Essences are stored in the %1$s after it contains at least %2$s of certain Essence combinations based on any Aspect, the cage will become an %3$s which will no longer contain essences, but a matching Aspect, ready to be used

For example, %1$s requires %2$s which will make the %3$s of %4$s
But %5$s requires %6$s and %7$s which will make the %8$s of %9$s
dialog.aspects.essences.explanation.how_: There are 2 main ways to extract these Essences from mobs:
Killing mobs with any Direct Damage
Do note that you cannot store more essences in the %1$s, but if you got the wrong one and want to remove that Aspect, or want to just empty your current %2$s you can using the following items:
dialog.aspects.essences.explanation.what:
Every mob has up to 2 Essences (+1 if an Apex) associated with them and each mob can give different amounts of those essences depending how rare they are.

Essences contain mobs physical attributes to be forged into something new
dialog.aspects.essences.explanation.wher: Essences are not items you can simply hold, they must have special containers to house them, such as:
dialog.aspects.essences.list.apex: Essences of big bads of their respective locations, some may even call them Bosses or Mini-Bosses. They represent unmatched power and standing.
dialog.aspects.essences.list.aquatic: Essences of water-dwelling or moisture-dependent creatures. Often found in mobs that thrive in aquatic environments or require water to survive.
dialog.aspects.essences.list.beast: Essences of strong, animalistic creatures. These embody raw physicality and instinct.
dialog.aspects.essences.list.bug: Essences of insect-like or arthropod creatures. Small, resilient, and often numerous, they represent adaptability and persistence.
dialog.aspects.essences.list.dark: Essences of creatures attuned to darkness or shadow. These beings often thrive in low light and possess mysterious or sinister qualities.
dialog.aspects.essences.list.ethereal: Essences of spectral or otherworldly beings. Nearly intangible and very elusive.
dialog.aspects.essences.list.feline: Essences of cat-like creatures. Agile, quick, and predatory, they embody grace and sharp instincts.
dialog.aspects.essences.list.fire: Essences of creatures attuned to heat or flame. These beings are often resistant to fire and embody destructive energy.
dialog.aspects.essences.list.flying: Essences of airborne creatures. Masters of the sky, they represent freedom, speed, and agility.
dialog.aspects.essences.list.header:
This list contains all Essences and their descriptions
Remember that each mob has up to 2 Essences (+1 if an Apex) and each mob based on rarity can privide more or less Essences per type then others!
dialog.aspects.essences.list.humanoid: Essences of human-like beings. Defined by intelligence, adaptability, and social structure.
dialog.aspects.essences.list.ice: Essences of cold-adapted creatures. They thrive in freezing environments and often wield the power of frost.
dialog.aspects.essences.list.normal: Essences of ordinary, unremarkable creatures. Balanced and common.
dialog.aspects.essences.list.ooze: Essences of amorphous, gelatinous beings. Flexible and resilient.
dialog.aspects.essences.list.plant: Essences of plant-based or nature-attuned creatures. They embody growth, resilience, and the cycles of nature.
dialog.aspects.essences.list.steel: Essences of tough, armored creatures. Durable and strong, they are often resistant to harm or tough to kill.
dialog.aspects.essences.list.undead: Essences of creatures that defy death. These beings are sustained by unnatural forces and often resist conventional harm.
dialog.aspects.essences.list.void: Essences of beings connected to The End or other similar dimensions. Alien and mysterious, they possess strange powers.
dialog.aspects.essences.list.wild: Essences of untamed, feral creatures. They embody the spirit of the wilderness.
enchantment.aspects.water_ward.descripti: Delays damage taken from water for Hydrophobic Aspects
equipment.item.head: Helmet
equipment.slot.head: Head
item.aspects.aspect_encyclopedia.aspect_: This Aspect does not have any Aspect Effects
This Aspect does not have any Focus Powers
item.aspects.aspect_picker.tooltip: Select your Aspect from Aspects with this book
item.aspects.essence_cage.awaken_conditi: With enough Essences becomes a specific Awakened Essence Cage
item.aspects.essence_cage.explorer_note: The first one's on the house ;)
item.aspects.essence_cage.use_condition_: When held with an Essence Extractor:
item.aspects.essence_cage.use_result_1: Mob kills are stored as Essences
item.aspects.essence_cleaner.use_conditi: When used while holding any Essence Cage:
item.aspects.essence_extractor.disclaime: Essence can only be extracted once per mob
item.aspects.essence_extractor.use_condi: When used while holding an Essence Cage:
item.aspects.essence_extractor.use_resul: Extract passive mobs Essences into it
item.aspects.faded_relic.elytrian.lore_1: A shimmer of cloud-born freedom trapped in form...
item.aspects.faded_relic.elytrian.lore_3: Light as a feather, heavy with regret...
item.aspects.faded_relic.elytrian.lore_4: The relic hums with memories of flight...
item.aspects.faded_relic.enderian.lore_1: Its surface warps like distant realms...
item.aspects.faded_relic.enderian.lore_2: A lingering echo of violet void space...
item.aspects.faded_relic.enderian.lore_3: Once it bent distance to its master's will...
item.aspects.faded_relic.enderian.lore_4: Ender echoes swirl, mournful and strange...
item.aspects.faded_relic.feline.lore_1: Silent, nimble power lost to time...
item.aspects.faded_relic.feline.lore_2: A soft purr of past freedom lingers here...
item.aspects.faded_relic.feline.lore_3: Once it danced through shadows and rooftops...
item.aspects.faded_relic.generic.lore_1: A hollow memory of what once there...
item.aspects.faded_relic.generic.lore_10: Left behind, but never truly forgotten...
item.aspects.faded_relic.generic.lore_11: A master left, but this remained loyal...
item.aspects.faded_relic.generic.lore_2: Its glow is dim, but it still remembers...
item.aspects.faded_relic.generic.lore_3: Whispers of power, lingering in forgotten corners...
item.aspects.faded_relic.generic.lore_4: You feel nostalgia emanating from it....
item.aspects.faded_relic.generic.lore_5: A keepsake from an abandoned way of life...
item.aspects.faded_relic.generic.lore_6: The relic mourns its owner's departure...
item.aspects.faded_relic.generic.lore_7: A relic, dulled by time and choice...
item.aspects.faded_relic.generic.lore_9: Once it called for a master, now it waits in silence...
item.aspects.faded_relic.honey_bee.lore_: A faint hum stirs in the air around it...
Sticky sweetness clings to faded memories...
Once it pulsed with hive-song and warmth...
item.aspects.faded_relic.human.lore_2: A relic built on tenacity and dream...
item.aspects.faded_relic.human.lore_3: Its story is simple, yet vast...
item.aspects.faded_relic.infernal.lore_1: Flickers of flame smoulder in its cracks...
item.aspects.faded_relic.infernal.lore_2: It carries the scent of brimstone...
item.aspects.faded_relic.infernal.lore_3: Dark pacts and broken oaths swirl within...
item.aspects.faded_relic.merling.lore_1: You hear phantom waves upon the shore...
item.aspects.faded_relic.merling.lore_2: The relic shimmers like water's surface...
item.aspects.faded_relic.merling.lore_3: It recalls the pull of deep currents...
item.aspects.faded_relic.merling.lore_4: Pearlescent light dances across its form...
item.aspects.faded_relic.rascal.lore_1: It carries the memory of endless stone corridors...
item.aspects.faded_relic.rascal.lore_2: It recalls great veins of minerals...
item.aspects.faded_relic.rascal.lore_4: The relic feels light, ready to vanish...
item.aspects.faded_relic.shulk.lore_1: The relic's shell is unnaturally resilient...
item.aspects.faded_relic.shulk.lore_2: For a moment you could have mistaken it for something else...
item.aspects.faded_relic.shulk.lore_3: A hardened relic of disciplined solitude...
item.aspects.focus.elytrian.use_conditio: When used in Main Hand while holding specific dyes in Off Hand:
item.aspects.focus.elytrian.use_result_2: Dye your wings with a color pattern
item.aspects.focus.honey_bee.use_conditi: When used in Main Hand while holding flowers in Off Hand:
When used in Main Hand while holding a Glass Bottle in Off Hand:
When used in Main Hand while holding a Honey Bottle in Off Hand:
When used in Main Hand while Sneaking and holding a Suspicious Honey Bottle in Off Hand:
item.aspects.focus.honey_bee.use_result_: Extract a Potion Effect of the held flower
Consumes Food to create a Honey Bottle with the stored Potion Effect
Add the stored Potion Effect to the Honey Bottle
Changes the Potion Effect of the Suspicious Honey Bottle without changing the label
Check what Potion Effect is stored
item.aspects.focus.infernal.use_result_1: Set self On Fire for %s seconds
item.aspects.focus.merling.use_result_1: Wet entities within %1$s blocks glow for %2$s seconds
item.aspects.focus.rascal.use_condition_: When used in any other Dimension:
item.aspects.focus.rascal.use_result_1: Teleport randomly underground within a large area
item.aspects.focus.rascal.use_result_2: Teleport randomly within a small area
item.aspects.focus.rascal.use_result_3: Teleport randomly within a very large area
item.aspects.focus.rascal.use_result_4: Teleport randomly within a medium area
item.aspects.focus.shulk.use_condition_1: When hitting a Chest or Barrel while Sneaking:
item.aspects.focus.shulk.use_result_1: Store Chest or Barrel for later use
item.aspects.focus.shulk.use_result_2: Place a stored Chest or Barrel at a pointed location
item.aspects.focus.shulk.use_result_3: Camouflage as a block held in Main Hand
item.aspects.shattered_relic.elytrian.lo: A draft stirs where none should exist...
The relic shudders the loss of flight...
item.aspects.shattered_relic.enderian.lo: Ender echoes scream in broken silence...
A piece of void, ruptured and bitter...
It weeps for the lost veil of space...
item.aspects.shattered_relic.feline.lore: Nine lives cracked down to none...
A soft echo of a once silent step...
item.aspects.shattered_relic.generic.lor: The pieces hum, seeking the soul they lost...
A relic tainted by death's touch...
Each shard carries a memory of the fall...
A cursed shard of stolen might...
Fragments of what was, clinging to what could be...
A relic torn from its rightful bearer...
It smells faintly of lightning and ash...
Some say it weeps for its owner...
item.aspects.shattered_relic.honey_bee.l: Honey runs like sorrow from its fractures...
The hive-song lies dead and still...
Once a buzzing warmth, now cold wax...
Echoes of loyalty lost in ruin...
item.aspects.shattered_relic.human.lore_: Splintered resolve clings to its remains...
An ordinary spark, snuffed in war...
The relic hums with fragile defiance...
item.aspects.shattered_relic.infernal.lo: Broken flames flicker at its edge...
Whispers of old steel lie scattered...
Its heat comes in dying bursts...
A relic sundered in bitter betrayal...
item.aspects.shattered_relic.merling.lor: The relic weeps brine in silence...
Tides once heard here have ebbed forever...
A hollow shell of deep-sea song...
The ocean's pulse fades from its grasp...
item.aspects.shattered_relic.rascal.lore: It carries the memory of endless stone corridors...
Faint glimmers of lost veins shimmer in the cracks...
The relic hums with the hunger for untold riches...
It remembers the mines, now swallowed by darkness...
item.aspects.shattered_relic.shulk.lore_: Its protective shell lies cracked and defeated...
The relic trembles with forgotten fortitude...
Echoes of stone walls collapse within...
A lost bastion in the void...
item.aspects.universal_essence_cage.use_: Overrides your Aspect with one of your choice
